appraisal.reason: According to this newsletter, Saturday confessions are 10:00-11:00 and 17:00-17:50, not until 18:00. Your expected 17:00-18:00 slot is therefore longer than scheduled. Weekday (12:00-12:20) and Sunday (10:00-10:30 and 12:00-12:30) times are correct. Please refer to the published schedule for accuracy.

name: Our Lady of Mount Carmel & St Simon Stock
